description: Thanks Katia for being extremely Collaborative with me and Territory Implementation. You have always been quick in understanding the requirement and provide us with speedy and brilliant solutions. I would like to shout out for your superb collaboration with us and looking forward to a more wonderful journey with you and IS going ahead.

Benny has been exceptional in transforming his ideas into real world implementations. His contribution towards creation of the Template extension has got some really good feedbacks and has been greatly appreciated. Not limited to this, he has been showing full zeal in contributing towards other initiatives as well. Would like to appreciate Benny towards his quality of empowering the Team with the much need tools to focus on efficiency and quality.

I would like to appreciate the way Roshan properly documents all the cases that are escalated to Custom Team, with all the steps and checks that the custom team follows. It has greatly helped us in decreasing the escalations to custom. Thanks for imparting and enhancing our knowledge.
Just want to give a shout out to Benny , Vivek and Arun for being always so collaborative and making this work from home fun .

Since the day Rohit got promoted, I can see him working very aggressively towards achieving his goals and always striving to be better at what he is doing. I want to appreciate Rohit for his positive attitude towards learning new things.

Roshan is very versatile with his deliverables. His discipline and commitment towards his work is unquestionable. 
He is a great team player and has a very positive mindset. He always ensures his deliveries within the given timelines and with complete dedication. 
I want to appreciate Roshan for being such a crucial team player and being able to exhibit these qualities consistently.
Guarav is the wild card of our team. He prefers to be quiet and deliver extra ordinary stuffs. His capability to deliver under pressure situations and short deadlines makes him special.

Since the day Chirag has joined Spirit Committee, he has been a great support pillar to the team. His commitment and efforts are worth appreciating. I want to thank him for always being on top for any kind of help and proving the real meaning of being a Team Player.

Hi,

I want to appreciate your efforts for being an expert.

This is test shoutout.

Collaborative thinking is probably one of the most important competency one has to have and it is even more important that leaders are able to develop the similar mindset in their team members. I vividly remember my visit to London office last year and the challenges people in different business teams was facing while working the TI team. We have walked a long way together solving each of those challenges and taking our relationship to new heights every day. It was possible because of Arthur and his team's positive outlook for TI and Working with Arthur and his team is always a pleasure. Thank you Arthur!
Amazing
Thank you for being out Batman <3

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description: Eloise, thanks so much for your hard work on this peer-to-peer recognition and gratitude program - I am very excited about this Taboola Inspire project now live!

Poonam has improved greatly in terms of handling customers and being an expert in the Taboola News front. She has also shown great initiation with the India Spirit Committee. Unfortunately, the form only allows me to select one quality. She has great potential, and her hard-work and professionalism is worth mentioning.
Patient / Resilient / Positive

Simon, thank you so much for the tremendous work you've been doing for the UK Pub Enterprise this year. Your ability to step into calls and offer your technical support and knowledge, the speed by which you execute and the quality of your work are inspirational to the team and everyone knows they can trust you blindly when you deliver a task.

It's a pleasure working alongside you, so just wanted to say Thank You for dealing with all our obscene and urgent requests in such a manner and contributing to our revenues and relationship with our partners.

Maayan is really good in Collaboration, bringing new ideas/innovations to the projects. She is very supportive & a very good listener. She is always available.
Thank You Maayan & Lee :)

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: It is a pleasure to come to work every day with people like you in the team ! :)
He is very humble and provides detailed information about the product from start. Good guidance is all that a rookie needs and he does the job efficiently.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: Thank you so much for helping me throughout, thanks for always assigning me different types of cases and helping me with that. It helped me a lot in terms of understanding the product. I truly appreciate your way of handling cases, they are always done smartly and in an optimized way. I am still trying to learn that skill form you :)
Has immense knowledge of product and very supportive. Thanks for being there when I was confused. He is the best buddy I had as along as I have worked with this organisation.

Hi Newsroom Nigel,
Thank you so much for your great support in organising the first virtual Oktoberfest! I truly enjoyed collaborating with you. I believe the 2 events we have organized in the last months have been the best Taboola events during lockdown. :-)
Thanks for your hard work, great ideas and editorial skills! 
Cheers!
Janina

Thank you so much for your creative solutions and for helping me will all the great tips and tricks which can be used while solving a case and enhancing the product knowledge. I truly appreciate all your help and support :)

Thank you so much for your creative solutions and for helping me will all the great tips and tricks which can be used while solving a case and enhancing the product knowledge. I truly appreciate all your help and support :)

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description:
Thanks for providing the fundamental training. I truly appreciate the way you provided the virtual training they all were very interactive.
Also, thanks a lot for sharing the history behind creating any process, it helped me in understanding my responsibilities more clearly.

Thank you so much :)

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
First of all I would like to thank her for making me what I am in this organisation. She has laid foundation of my knowledge for the process. She has always been there for me be it in shift or off shift. I would also like to thank for her humbleness, while I was very new to the organisation I know I used to ask very silly things but she was always there to explain me same thing over and over. 

Thanks for being there.

Being a Shift Lead I know it’s much more than what we do ,still you helped me in whatever and whenever way its possible. I really grateful to have you as a senior member in the team. Thanks for motivating me to pick much difficult cases to built up my confidence.

Thanks for always being there for your juniors.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
When I started my training, it seemed like everything is so complicated for me because this process is new for me but the way you clearing  my doubts  regarding any case & any topic ,It helped me a lot to understand everything .I truly appreciate all your help and support :)
Thank you so much

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: Thanks for your efforts to keep us all connected in a fun way during wfh times. We really appreciate the content and efforts

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
Thank you very much for being a great buddy, Mathilde!

You're always taking time to jump on a call when I have questions or need help and even invited me into your home to make me feel part of the team! Thank you!

I really appreciate your help and look forward to working with you back in the office! :)

Thank you for being a great Manager, Maxime!

I really appreciate that you're making time available in your calendar every day to make sure we can catch-up and talk about any questions that came up during the day. Also thank you for giving me suggestions on how to sell Taboola, how to optimise and make the most out of my accounts & even jumping on calls with German clients to support me.

When I had the interview, one of the most important points for me was having a good training but I really wasn't expecting this kind of support, especially during this time! So thank you for going above and beyond!

Thanks for your advice and the sales sessions we had! 
It really helped me figuring out how to approach and communicate with publishers in the most effective way by being personal and "helping" instead of "selling".

Thank you for being a great colleague and your help so far!

It's good to know that I can ensure my future publishers that they will have a very friendly & professional Account Manager with great product knowledge. I guess it's now on me to deliver :)

Thank you, Kateryna!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description:
Hi Guys!

I wanted to take the time to thank all of you for being great team members,  for your willingness to help and for making the last few months and the whole onboarding a lot easier and less weird for me!

I really appreciate that everyone is regularly checking in and asking if there is anything they can do for me. There is not one single person in the team who hasn't offered me their help yet which is really remarkable - especially as I know how busy you all are!

I hope I can meet all of you soon and look forward to working with you in person when we can finally go back into the office :)

Thank you!

Cedric

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: Vivek is always ready to help everyone in the Team. Always available and is very approachable. Thank you for being so supportive!
Thanks Vivek for always been available and to never say no for anything . You are a rock-star (keep rocking)

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: He is always ready to help and support teammates.

message: Contributing to the maintenance and definition of Taboola's culture
description: Legends who work hard with great team spirit!!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: David has been great to work with! From simply being a great source of info and brainstorming, to developing fantastic relationships with clients who then get "promoted" from the Optimise BoB to the SMB AM BoBs, making my work a lot easier, as they are already keen to optimise with us :)
Vipan is always there when I am lost. He is really humble and explains in detail what can be the next steps. He is also very supportive just one ping and he is ready to help.

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: It is always a pleasure to work with Gaurav. always willing to learn new things, A great collaborator and colleague.

message: Taking on and delivering on projects outside day-to-day responsibilities
description: I have always appreciated the way you accept challenges. Never say no attitude and passion to go beyond is something which is a rare quality and you have proved it multiple times.

message: Taking on and delivering on projects outside day-to-day responsibilities
description:
I have always appreciated this quality within you. Never say no attitude and accepting challenges with open arms is something which is rare and you have proved it time and again.
Very proud of you.

From Shout Out to My T and SDK Demp app. You have covered a long journey within a very short span. With you extreme dedication and commitment to get things done even if something is unknown to you is what makes you special. I am really blessed to have a team member like you.Whatever you do you make sure that the work SUCCESS is always attached to it. 
BRILLIANT!

message: Taking on and delivering on projects outside day-to-day responsibilities
description:
You have shown a great deal of maturity showing how one can adopt to new things and step into some challenging role with a positive attitude.
You have grown up as a matured professional real quick and your deliverables are never compromised even if you are loaded with multiple projects. 
You hunger to learn and passion towards your work is extra ordinary.

You have created an example of where age must be considered just a number. Your ability and knowledge on products and its functionality has helped many to deal with tough situations and provide a solution. You innovative thinking has helped TI to create a significant impact within PS and your nature of helping others without compromising your deliverables is commendable.

You have been a real character with our new project. Figuring out such solutions within such a short span of time is extra ordinary. Understanding the criticality and dedicating yourself completely into this critical project is something which would bring success to it

After seeing successful execution of our pilot on Stretch assignments, we wanted to spread the awareness about this program in entire PS. The first person who came in mind was Tzlil and she eagerly agreed to help us to promote the success of Stretch assignment to encourage others to take advantage of this unique competency development tool. Tzlil did an amazing job by creating a solid marketing plan and worked with different stakeholders to create the marketing content. Thank you so much Tzlil for excellent work on this. I truly appreciate it.
A great guy to work with and he is as humble as one can be. If in the same shift I can turn towards him for help and he is always there.
test

Benny is very helpful and supportive with managing of task.
Always willing to learn new things, A great collaborator.

Tarek has been supporting us very actively with all the requirements raised to IT Prod. His turnaround time is exemplary and he is very accurate with his deliverables.
He seems to be an expert on his domain which makes it look easy for him. I would like to appreciate Tarek for all the support he has been providing us till date. Thank you and very good work.

Hi Design Team! I wanted to take the time to thank all
of you for being great team members, for your
willingness to help and for making the last few challenging
weeks smooth by staying on top of all the tasks and priorities. Really appreciate all these efforts from each one of you and this wonderful team together makes me feel empowered.
Thank You Karan, Aman, Suman & Jackey
Looking forward to the moment when we will meet again in office and remember all the hard time we faced.

Kat, I want to congratulate you on your recent work with 2 former Optimise accounts - Niederösterreichisches Pressehaus - Network  and 5minuten. These premium publishers are not the easiest of customers and you have shown how great you are at relationship building and generating huge amounts of revenue! You have improved the performance on these sites to a level that I didn't think was possible. 5minuten told me they wanted to churn at one point because they didn't like Taboola and now they are now grossing over €2,000 on some days - AMAZING! 
Big congrats to you on your superb account management skills and your ability to make money with difficult premium news sites!
Thank you for being such a strong member of our team!

Kat, I want to congratulate you on your recent work with 2 former Optimise accounts - Niederösterreichisches Pressehaus - Network  and 5minuten. These premium publishers are not the easiest of customers and you have shown how great you are at relationship building and generating huge amounts of revenue! You have improved the performance on these sites to a level that I didn't think was possible. 5minuten told me they wanted to churn at one point because they didn't like Taboola and now they are now grossing over €2,000 on some days - AMAZING! 
Big congrats to you on your superb account management skills and your ability to make money with difficult premium news sites!
Thank you for being such a strong member of our team!

Thanks Adam for always trying to solve all the complex tracking issues I have with my clients and for always being ready to jump on a call on a very short notice! My life as an AM would be much harder without your support, thanks for everything you do!

I have been working with Poonam in our Taboola News forum in support.
It is a shame that there is only one option to pick from here!
I have picked 'Be an Expert' because I feel like Poonam is an expert in most qualities: She is highly collaborative, acting with a customer centric approach, eager to learn about Taboola News and always on the lookout for any issues that either clients face or support face in handling client issues.
She is very good at recognising trends of issues, and always tries to come up with the best way to solve it.

Poonam is reliable, I feel like I can trust her to do the job required in order for the TN forum to keep acting as a power centre to all TN related issues.

The TN forum is better every day, thanks to the efforts and dedication that Poonam is showing.
Thanks! and well done :)
I ping her and she is right there helping me out with my findings and there is nothing that I can't ask her about the product. She is a true expert and awesome by nature.

Thank you, Nigel!

We recently had a Zoom-Call with MVV, a Publisher Network based in Germany.

Nigel took his time to pitch Newsroom to the publisher and really made sure the MVV-Team understood all the benefits and possibilities Newsroom has to offer.

Their Editorial Team was not a big fan of Taboola before but Nigel was able to completely change their mind and they sent me an email right after the meeting confirming that they will stay with us after the test month.

Thanks again for your help!

Thanks a lot for all your help, Shivam!
I know you have a busy schedule and I really appreciate that you’re always happy to take time to answer my questions, keep me updated and even jump on calls to discuss tricky implementations.
You’re a star!
Thank you Yoav for being such a great teammate! Your work with the Taboola News team is inspiring, keep up the great work!

I appreciate the collaboration of Diwakar and how he cooperate with the teammates is unbelievable. Thank you so much Diwakar for your hard work and putting so much of efforts in team collaboration and helping me throughout my tough cases.

Hi Anant,
I just wanted to let you know how much I appreciate working with you on Optimise projects. You are a brilliant colleague who is willing to go the extra mile to get things done. You are customer focussed and always willing to drive revenue and product adoption for the business. Thanks to your expert knowledge, great organisational skills and collaborative approach to tasks, you are a true Taboolar! I know that these projects are very much a team effort so I would like to use this space to thank your team as well. However as leader of these projects, I want to thank you personally. 
Thank you, Anant for all of your work over the past few months! I wish you all the best in 2021!
David

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description:
Thank you Benny for showing great customer centric, collaboration and positive attitude as all these qualities are pillars of our vision. I really appreciate how quickly you have adapted and learning since you joined the team. 
Apart from this, a big thanks for working with me on a priority case and delivering it with expertise. 
Cheers!
Ravinder explains everything in detail and he is an expert on the product.  Happy to have such a guy as my senior.

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description:
Hi Ileana, I would to like take a moment and say thank you for all your help with legal affairs for India location. In-spite of you being in an exactly opposite time zone, you have always been very prompt and made yourself available to discuss important matters. I truly appreciate your commitment and on behalf of entire India location I say a huge thanks to you. 

Looking forward for an amazing partnership with you in 2021 and years to come. 

Regards,
Jay
testing testing

Hi Katherine, 
Thank you for helping Liane and me with our million questions about the advertiser side of the business! By improving our knowledge of the advertiser's experience and goals, you have helped us to better educate our publishers on how Taboola works and how their RPMs are influenced. We naturally avoid talking about CPCs and Feed content with our publishers, but we are definitely in a better position to tackle these questions and concerns. 
You are clearly an expert in technical analysis and your customers' business needs - an asset to your AM team! 
Thank you!

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: Anil is always there whenever I stuck with some Question. He explains to me the issue and how can we solve this. He always there for me. So thank you so much for all.

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description:
I really appreciate all your extra efforts put in the daily tasks while shift leads are on leave or cannot cover. You really deserve this token of appreciation for offering to work for us.
When we all have our plates full, managing work in someone’s absence is hard. It’s employees like you who prefer to help out with some extra work and that is all that makes it work.
We are proud to have sincere colleague like you working with us. Please keep up the good work!!
Thank you for always being the first to volunteer a helping hand whenever we are on off. We couldn’t do it without you.
Reliability is hard to come by. Thank you for being someone we can always count on! we are  so grateful for all of your hard work. The entire Shift leads team thanks you for everything you do.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: karan helped me a lot in my recent project where I had dependency on him for video correction and modification. Thanks to him for providing such a great help.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
I needed Karan's help in video editing for one of my projects. Karan went above and beyond to help me with all the videos. 
Thank you Karan for always being a great help for everyone in the team.

Arun is a phenomenal person and I appreciate the collaboration of Arun and how he cooperate with the teammates.

Kudos keep up the good work.

Hi Cait, 

On behalf of entire India team,  I would like to thank you for your time today for iEngage initiative and bringing such an amazing insight on business and importance of collaboration. People thoroughly enjoyed listening to you and I know it will help in creating much needed connections to deliver best services to our clients.

Regards,
Jay

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description:
For a while now Emily is doing a great job investigating cases on a very high level.
Taking every case seriously and performing thorough investigations for each case to get to the bottom of it.
In my opinion, her investigations and escalations are the most detailed and thorough out of all 2nd level members. 
She is also always ready to help, taking responsibilities and doing it with a smile and a great attitude.
I believe she is a very valuable member of the 2nd level team and should be appreciated for it.

I appreciate the collaboration of Anant and how he cooperates with all
the teammates are unbelievable. Thank you so much Anant for your hard
work and putting so much of an effort in team collaboration and helping all of us with this"Process Streamline with Best practice"initiative.
I want to mention one more thing that Anant is one stop for all the solution, He is technically very sound and have deep down knowledge of Taboola product that is really admirable.

Thanks Again!
